title: Mouse laggs while ingame
body: I  instaled windows 10 on my pc and since then i have those mouse laggs, like when i move mouse cursor is lagging, its not going smooth, like my mouse fps is dropping but everything else works well, please help if someone found a fix for this

replies.body:
Do you have any third party software for your mouse that could be getting in the way?  Would you also be able to swap to another mouse to help rule out possibilities with hardware?  There are a lot of possibilities here, even a possible configuration issue.  A config reset could help here as well:

Log into the game client.
Navigate to C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\Config
Delete the file  named **game.cfg** and **persistedsettings.json**
Go into a custom game and verify that settings have saved properly.  Leave game to sync settings. 

Let me know if those steps help!
